text: Henry Sterns was an American bobsledder who competed in the late 1940s. He won a silver medal in the four-man event at the 1949 FIBT World Championships in Lake Placid, New York. ==References== *Bobsleigh four-man world championship medalists since 1930 Category:American male bobsledders Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Henry Sterns
